Helped students who were having trouble with the subject matter. Ensured that all students were focused on their work. Ensured all work was returned to students in a timely manner.

Studied logic, mathematical proofs, induction, graph theory, probability, combinatorics and discrete mathematics. Also studied sorting algorithms, divide and conquer algorithms, greedy algorithms, dynamic programming, network flows and NP completeness.
